name: The Creator's Soulbook
headline: Write the Book Your Soul Came Here to Write
subheadline: A complete life operating system with 7 pillars, 3 life book frameworks, and AI-powered coaching prompts. Free Obsidian vault included.
promise: Design, track, and transform every dimension of your life with a framework built for creators, artists, and visionaries.
summary: Your personal collection of Life Books offering different lenses for transformation. Includes complete Obsidian vault, AI prompt library, and reflection templates.
transformation: Map all 7 life pillars (Energy, Mind, Soul, Craft, Capital, Circle, Legacy) with structured reflection exercises
Choose your transformation lens: Life Symphony (for artists), Golden Path (for seekers), or 7 Pillars (for builders)
Access 25+ AI coaching prompts designed for deep self-reflection and life architecture
Download ready-to-use Obsidian vault with templates, dashboards, and pre-configured themes

guarantee.label: Open Source Forever
guarantee.description: The Creator's Soulbook is and will always be free. Open source on GitHub for the creator community.

modules.title: The 7 Pillars Framework
modules.description: Energy, Mind, Soul, Craft, Capital, Circle, and Legacy - the complete architecture for an extraordinary life.

modules.title: Three Life Book Perspectives
modules.description: Life Symphony (for artists), Golden Path (for seekers), and The 7 Pillars (for builders) - same wisdom, different metaphors.

modules.title: AI Coaching Prompt Library
modules.description: 25+ Claude-powered prompts for deep reflection, goal-setting, and transformation tracking.

modules.title: Obsidian Vault Templates
modules.description: Ready-to-use daily reflection templates, weekly reviews, and progress dashboards with Dataview integration.

faq.question: Do I need Obsidian to use the Soulbook?
faq.answer: The vault works best with Obsidian (free app), but the frameworks and prompts work in any note-taking system or even pen and paper.

faq.question: Which Life Book should I start with?
faq.answer: If you're a musician or artist, start with Life Symphony. If you're a seeker or visionary, try Golden Path. If you prefer structured systems, The 7 Pillars is for you.

faq.question: Is there a premium version?
faq.answer: The complete framework is free forever. Premium options include guided programs, community support, and 1:1 coaching - coming soon.

transformation: Deploy 100+ validated prompts across storytelling, marketing, content, and operations within 48 hours
Cut content creation time by 40-50% while maintaining creative voice and quality
Run 12 plug-and-play automations (email, social, drafting) that handle the mechanical stuff

faq.question: What makes the FrankX.ai system different?
faq.answer: Every asset is validated across six specialized agents, ensuring strategic, creative, and technical excellence rather than single-expert bias.

faq.question: Who is the toolkit for?
faq.answer: Creators, consultants, and teams who want a governed, repeatable AI workflow that scales from solo practice to enterprise delivery.

faq.question: How fast will I see results?
faq.answer: Most members report tangible improvements within one week using the quick-start rituals and daily momentum prompts.

name: Vibe OS: Suno Music Mastery
headline: From Emotional Vision to Finished Track in One Studio Session
subheadline: 50+ genre-specific Suno prompts + emotion mapping system + release playbooks. Go from blank page to a track you're proud to ship in 90 minutes.
promise: Release consistent, high-quality music every week. Studio-tested frameworks that turn feelings into sound.
summary: Structured sonic rituals, production polish, and monetization playbooks that make Suno your actual creative studio.
transformation: Ship finished tracks in 60-90 minutes instead of weeks (tested across 500+ sessions)
Translate specific emotions into sonic cues using the Vibe OS emotion lattice system
Release 1 track per week consistently with genre templates, mixing guides, and publishing checklists
Move from experimentation to monetizable releases with licensing pathways and catalog strategies

guarantee.label: Creative Breakthrough Guarantee
guarantee.description: Test the system for 30 days. If you don't produce music you're proud to release, we'll refund your purchase.

modules.title: Genre-Specific Prompt Vault
modules.description: 50+ prompts spanning electronic, hip-hop, ambient, cinematic, and world styles with ready-to-use variations.

modules.title: Creative Workflow Templates
modules.description: Step-by-step blueprints for ideation, drafting, polishing, and publishing across different project types.

modules.title: Emotion Mapping System
modules.description: Translate feelings into sonic cues using the Vibe OS emotion lattice and micro-adjustment techniques.

faq.question: Do I need music theory or production experience?
faq.answer: No. Vibe OS includes beginner-friendly onboarding and explains every prompt so you can create professional results without prior training.

faq.question: Will my tracks sound generic if they are AI-assisted?
faq.answer: The emotion mapping system and iterative workflows help you dial in signature sounds, ensuring each track feels personal and distinctive.

faq.question: Can I release or sell music created with Vibe OS?
faq.answer: Yes. The toolkit covers distribution, licensing, and revenue pathways so you can confidently publish and monetize your music.

name: Creation Chronicles
headline: Build Authority Through Consistent, Compelling Stories
subheadline: From fragmented content to a unified narrative system that grows your audience 3x and converts readers into paying customers every month.
promise: A storytelling operating system that turns your voice into a revenue engine. Clear strategy. Repeatable production. Measurable growth.
summary: Strategic frameworks, AI-assisted workflows, and distribution rituals that ship stories consistently and build real authority.
transformation: Replace scattered messaging with a core narrative arc that runs through every piece you ship (essays, videos, social)
Publish 2-3x more content with the same effort using templated AI workflows (writers report 40-60% time savings)
Grow engaged community with distribution playbooks that send your best work to the right people every week
Track revenue impact: each piece connected to pipeline milestones so you see what storytelling actually returns

guarantee.label: Narrative Impact Guarantee
guarantee.description: Implement the core storytelling sprints for 45 days. If you don't see clearer messaging and measurable engagement lifts, we refund you in full.

pricingTiers.name: Creator Package
pricingTiers.description: Solo creators and early-stage brands establishing their foundational story.

pricingTiers.name: Business Package
pricingTiers.description: Growing teams ready to scale narrative-led marketing with AI-assisted workflows.

pricingTiers.name: Enterprise Package
pricingTiers.description: Established organizations seeking custom storytelling operations and enablement.

faq.question: Will this work if we already have a content team?
faq.answer: Yes. Creation Chronicles slots into existing teams with playbooks for producers, editors, and leadership so everyone operates from the same narrative source code.

faq.question: Do we need AI tools in place to benefit?
faq.answer: We show you how to layer AI responsibly. Every workflow includes both manual and AI-assisted versions so you can adopt at your own pace.

faq.question: How much time should we expect to invest?
faq.answer: Plan for a 90-day rollout with weekly story sprints. Teams typically spend 4–6 hours per week implementing and reviewing.

name: Creator Studio OS
headline: Multiply Your Output. Protect Your Voice. Keep Creative Control.
subheadline: Custom-built multi-modal studio that automates versioning, distribution, and QA while you stay in the director's chair. 2-week sprint to full deployment.
promise: Go from 1-2 pieces per month to 3-4 per week. All channels. Same voice. Your standards.
summary: Hands-on buildout that creates a governed AI studio pipeline for video, audio, writing, and visuals calibrated to your brand.
transformation: Map your complete creative pipeline and identify exactly where AI accelerates (without replacing craft)
Build templated workflows so every idea automatically versions for YouTube, TikTok, podcast, email (1 creation = 6 pieces)
Ship with QA rituals and brand guidelines baked in so AI stays on-brand and collaborative
Track output velocity, audience signals, and revenue per piece on a live dashboard that shows what's actually working

guarantee.label: Creative Integrity Promise
guarantee.description: We co-design workflow changes with you. If the system does not boost output within 45 days, we iterate at no cost.

offer.note: Diagnostics map your current process, gaps, and the automation plan before any build begins.

modules.title: Creative Pipeline Blueprint
modules.description: Map every step from ideation to publish, highlighting where AI accelerates and where human craft stays in control.

modules.title: Automation & Templates
modules.description: Build prompt stacks, editing templates, caption writers, and distribution macros tailored to your channels.

modules.description: Train models on your voice, visuals, and guidelines with safety checks baked in.

modules.title: Performance Dashboard
modules.description: Run a Notion/Supabase dashboard that tracks output velocity, audience signals, and monetisation.

pricingTiers.name: Starter Studio
pricingTiers.description: Two-week sprint to audit your creative stack and ship a pilot workflow.

pricingTiers.name: Creator Collective
pricingTiers.description: Six-week engagement to roll out multi-channel automations and training.

pricingTiers.name: Residency
pricingTiers.description: Ongoing co-building with the FrankX agent collective for launches, tours, or season arcs.

faq.question: Is this just for big teams?
faq.answer: No. We design for solo creators up to small crews. The system scales, but it starts creator-first.

faq.question: How fast will we see impact?
faq.answer: Most sprints unlock a new publishing rhythm within 30 days. We track output velocity and sentiment so you can see progress.

faq.question: Do you train us on the tools?
faq.answer: Yes. Every build includes recorded walkthroughs, prompt decks, and live handoffs so you stay in control.

faq.question: Who is the Creator Lab for?
faq.answer: Creators with a body of work (songs, videos, essays, products) who want a reliable system to ship and monetise consistently.

faq.question: How much time should I budget?
faq.answer: Plan on 4-6 focused hours per week during the cohort. The self-paced track can flex, but momentum matters.

faq.question: Do I need a team?
faq.answer: No. We design the system for solo creators first. If you have collaborators, we fold them into the rituals.
